name: Encourado
description:
If there is a Brazilian Vampire, this is Encourado. In northeastern Brazil, the story is told of a man with nocturnal habits who dresses completely in black leather, and these clothes smell of bloodletting. The presence of the Encouraged inspires fear and respect. He only enters the houses he is invited to, however, he manages to find tricks to be invited. According to legends, he has a preference for people who do not attend church.
Wherever he goes, the hens stop laying eggs and don't eat properly. Dogs don't leave the house and moan all day long.<Crypto Legends | A Series by Renancio Monte | 2021>
